quote: the joy that you give to others is the joy that comes back to you
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: Joy is the holy fire that keeps our purpose warm and our intelligence aglow.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The key to knowing joy is being easily pleased.
author: Mark Nepo

quote: Joy is the infallible sign of the presence of God.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Joy is prayer; joy is strength: joy is love; joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: We could all do with a bit more joy in our lives couldn't we? The wonderful thing is that when we start spreading joy, we begin to actually experience more joy in our lives too!
author: Steve Goodier

quote: Joy is but the sign that creative emotion is fulfilling its purpose.
author: Charles Du Bos

quote: Joy is the fountain of youth.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Man is, that he may have Joy.
author: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints,  The Book of Mormon

quote: Joy blooms where minds and hearts are open.
author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quote: Joy came always after pain.
author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quote: Joy is distinctly a Christian word and a Christian thing. It is the reverse of happiness. Happiness is the result of what happens of an agreeable sort. Joy has its spring deep down inside. And that spring never runs dry, no matter what happens. Only Jesus gives that joy.
author: Samuel Gordon

quote: Smile to be a flower of joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you smile, you fill the world with joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To make this world joyful, let your heart overflow with joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Our purest form of joy comes when people we envy get hurt. That most genuine form of joy.
author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Haunted

quote: The bitterness of joy lies in the knowledge that it cannot last. Nor should joy last beyond a certain season, for, after that season, even joy would become merely habit.
author: Tanith Lee,  Delusion's Master

quote: The greatest joys in life are found not only in what we do and feel, but also in our quiet hopes and labors for others.
author: Bryant McGill,  Voice of Reason

quote: To know intense joy without a strong bodily frame, one must have an enthusiastic soul.
author: George Eliot,  Middlemarch

quote: Happiness is part of who we are. Joy is the feeling
author: Tony DeLiso,  Legacy: The Power Within

quote: Success is the relentless pursuit of joy.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Comparison is the thief of joy.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Love life. Live your life with joy so you may fill the world with joy. Let no one leave your presence without feeling the joy of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Many people lose the small joys in the hope for the big happiness.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: I think there’s no greater joy than completing a song out of thin air. It’s like inventing something, but it’s invisible, you know? It’s weird. It amazes me. You can send it out in the world, and that’s the joy. It’s like giving birth to all these songs and letting them go like they’re your kids.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: All who joy would winMust share it -- Happiness was born a twin.
author: George Gordon Byron,  Don Juan

quote: When we become conscious of love, our hearts dance with joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Live joy. Be kind. Love unconditionally.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: A thing of beauty is a joy forever.
author: John Keats,  Endymion: A Poetic Romance

quote: Joy descends gently upon us like the evening dew, and does not patter down like a hailstorm.
author: Jean Paul

quote: I do not care about happiness simply because I believe that joy is something worth fighting for.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Suffering teaches joy.
author: Sonia Rumzi

quote: Where humanitysowed faith, hope, and unity, joy’s garden blossomed.
author: Aberjhani,  The River of Winged Dreams

quote: For those constantly full of joy, they sometimes feel a little guilty for always feeling so good. That guilt is compassion: it flies in with an attempt to share one's joy with others who do not have it.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: Love the animals: God has given them the rudiments of thought and joy untroubled.
author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quote: God’s joy can fill our days with gladness until we receive the answer we are waiting for.
author: Suzanne Elizabeth Anderson,  Waiting with God

quote: ...nothing wonderful lasted forever. Joy was as fleeting as a shooting star that crossed the evening sky, ready to blink out at any moment.
author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven

quote: We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: I am forever grateful for not knowing—What would have been. WHAT WILL BE holds none of those bittersweet pangs and it is lit w joy.
author: Erica Goros

quote: To feel the joy of life, smile with love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Profound joy of the heart is like a magnet that indicates the path of life.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Swirl into joy today by sharing your caring with the world. Be a pillar of positivity.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quote: Through all of living have much joy and laughter, life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Making time to experience joy is the single most important thing you can do to heal your heart.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree,  The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: When you change your level of consciousness and awareness, the situation around you will change with joy.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: There I was, waiting, afraid I’d never experience the kind of joy yet to come, but hoping for it just the same.
author: Elizabeth Berg,  The Year of Pleasures

quote: Happiness is a gift and the trick is not to expect it, but to delight in it when it comes.
author: Charles Dickens,  Nicholas Nickleby

quote: Whether you know or not, you are the infinite potential of love, peace and joy
author: Amit Ray

quote: when we are powerless to do a thing, it is a great joy that we can come and step inside the ability of Jesus
author: Corrie ten Boom
